pages.text: A telepathic altar channels psychic energy into manipulating the minds of others, altering mob behavior in ways you can use to your own benefits.

pages.title: Tier I
pages.text: A Tier I Telepathic Altar is also known as a "Love Altar". It will automatically breed animals in range.$(br2)$(l)Base Speed:$() 60s / operation$(br)$(l)Efficiency Effect:$() Increases the number of babies per breeding.$(br)$(l)Requirements:$() The proper breeding food items must be supplied in the inventory below the focus.
